title: "Army, Virginia Tech Develop Machine Learning Approach to Manage Radar Performance"
excerpt: "The U.S. Army Combat Capabilities Development Command has worked with the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University and the Army Research Laboratory to create an automatic method for military radar systems to function in operational environments that are congested and have limited spectrum."
